E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 3/3/1991
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Robin Yount



Date: Friday, 3/3/1991
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Kansas City!

Regards,
Robin Yount



Date: Friday, 3/3/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are happy that you acquired Robin Yount.
The overall fan interest increases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Scouting Director
